I think that went well.
Clean this up. Now.
Was that as weird for you as it was for me?
translation.es: ¿Fue tan extraño para ti como lo fue para mí?

translation.en: Uh, I don't know.
translation.es: ¿Fue tan extraño para ti como lo fue para mí? No sé.

translation.en: Graduation caps?
Yeah. It's a private joke.
We matriculate a lot.
That's kind of miserable.
I mean, repeating high school over and over.
translation.es: Tener que repetir la secundaria una y otra vez.

translation.en: True, but the younger we start out in a new place, the longer we can stay there.
translation.es: Solo así podemos permanecer más tiempo en un lugar.

translation.en: Come on.
Yeah, this is my room.
No bed?
No, I don't...
I don't sleep.
Ever? No, not at all.
Okay. Mm...
Boy, you have so much music.
What are you listening to?
It's Debussy.
Claire De Lune is great.
What? I can't dance.
Well, I could always make you.
I'm not scared of you.
Well, you really shouldn't have said that.
You better hold on tight, spider monkey.
Do you trust me?
In theory.
Then close your eyes.
What?
[chuckles] This isn't real.
This kind of stuff just doesn't exist.
translation.es: Esta clase de cosas no existen.

translation.en: It does in my world.
[man] Whoa. Hold up.
It's human.
Arizona. Yo, what's happening?
So you and Cullen, huh?
That's... I don't like it.
I mean, I don't know,
he just looks at you like you're something to eat.
Here's your veggie plate, Stephenie.
Hey, sorry I'm late. Biology project.
translation.es: Disculpa la demora. Proyecto de Biología.

translation.en: I ordered you the spinach salad. I hope that's okay.
translation.es: Pedí la ensalada de espinaca. Espero que te guste.

translation.en: You should order one for yourself next time.
translation.es: Deberías probar una la próxima vez.

translation.en: Cut back on the steak.
Hey, I'm as healthy as a horse.
Say, Chief, boys want to know...
Did you find anything down by Queets River today?
translation.es: ¿Encontró algo en el río Queets hoy?

translation.en: Yeah, we found a bare human footprint,
but it looks like whoever that is is headed east
translation.es: Pero, sea quien sea, se dirige hacia el este.

translation.en: so Kitsap County sheriff is gonna take over from here.
translation.es: El comisario de Kitsap se hará cargo ahora.

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay?
I just hope they catch him fast.
Looks like your friends are flagging you.
It's okay if you wanna go join them.
I'm just gonna turn in early anyway.
translation.es: Yo me voy a acostar temprano.

translation.en: Me, too.
Bella, it's Friday night. Go out.
translation.es: Es viernes por la noche, Bella. Sal.

translation.en: Looks like the Newton boy's got a big smile for you.
translation.es: Parece que le caes bien al muchacho Newton.

translation.en: Yeah, he's a good buddy.
What about any of these other yahoos in town?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de los otros inútiles del pueblo?

translation.en: Anybody interest you?
Dad, we gonna talk about boys?
Yeah, I guess not.
I just feel like I leave you alone too much.
translation.es: Pero siento como que te dejo sola demasiado.

translation.en: You should be around people.
I don't really mind being alone.
I guess I'm kind of like my dad in that way.
translation.es: Supongo que en eso salí a mi papá.

translation.en: So, how's all the baseball stuff going?
Oh, Phil's working so hard.
You know, spring training.
We're looking for a house to rent in case things become more permanent.
translation.es: Estamos buscando una casa para alquilar.

translation.en: You'd like Jacksonville, baby.
Yeah?
I'm really liking Forks.
What?
Forks is growing on me.
Could a guy have anything to do with that?
Well, yeah.
I knew it. Tell me everything. What is he? Jock? Indie?
translation.es: Lo sabía. Cuéntamelo todo. ¿Es un atleta? ¿Independiente?

translation.en: -I bet he's smart. Is he smart? -[gasps]
Mom, can I talk to you later?
Come on, we gotta talk boys. Are you being safe?
How did you get in here?
The window.
Do you do that a lot?
Well, just the past couple of months.
translation.es: Solo hace un par de meses.

translation.en: I like watching you sleep.
It's kind of fascinating to me.
I always want to try one thing.
Just stay very still.
Don't move.
Stop it!
I'm sorry.
I'm stronger than I thought.
translation.es: Soy más fuerte de lo que pensaba.

translation.en: Yeah. I wish I could say the same.
I can't ever lose control with you.
translation.es: Jamás puedo perder el control contigo.

translation.en: Hey, don't go.
-Hey, got you another one. -Thanks.
I have a date with Edward Cullen.
translation.es: Tengo una cita con Edward Cullen.

translation.en: He's a little old for you, isn't he?
translation.es: Es un poco mayor para ti, ¿no?

translation.en: He's a junior. I'm a junior.
I thought you liked the Cullens.
translation.es: Creí que te gustaban los Cullen.

translation.en: I thought you didn't like any of the boys in town.
translation.es: Creí que no te gustaba ningún muchacho del pueblo.

translation.en: Edward doesn't live in town.
translation.es: Edward no vive en el pueblo.

translation.en: Technically.
He's right outside.
He is?
Yeah, he wanted to meet you, officially.
All right. Bring him in.
Could you be nice?
he's important.
Chief Swan.
I want to formally introduce myself. I'm Edward Cullen.
translation.es: Quería presentarme formalmente. Soy Edward Cullen.

translation.en: Hi, Edward.
Bella won't be out too late tonight.
She's just gonna play baseball with my family.
translation.es: Va a jugar béisbol con mi familia.

translation.en: Baseball?
Yes, sir, that's the plan.
[chuckles] Bella's gonna play baseball.
Well, good luck with that.
I'll take good care of her. I promise.
translation.es: Le prometo que cuidaré de ella.

translation.en: Hey.
Still got that pepper spray?
[whispers] Yeah, Dad.
And since when do vampires like baseball?
translation.es: ¿Desde cuándo a los vampiros les gusta el béisbol?

translation.en: Well, it's the American pastime
and there's a thunderstorm coming.
translation.es: y se aproxima una tormenta eléctrica.

translation.en: It's the only time we can play. You'll see why.
translation.es: Solo así podemos jugar. Ya verás.

translation.en: Glad you're here. We need an umpire.
translation.es: Me alegra que hayas venido. Necesitamos un árbitro.

translation.en: She thinks we cheat.
I know you cheat.
Call them as you see them, Bella. Okay.
translation.es: - Tú eres la ley, Bella. - Bueno.

translation.en: It's time.
Okay, now I see why you need the thunder.
translation.es: Ahora veo por qué necesitan los relámpagos.

translation.en: That's gotta be a home run, right?
Edward's very fast.
-You're out. -Out! Whoo!
Babe, come on. It's just a game.
Nice kitty.
What are you doing?
My monkey man.
Stop!
They were leaving. Then they heard us.
translation.es: Se estaban yendo, pero nos oyeron.

translation.en: Let's go. It's too late.
Get your hair down.
Like that'll help. I could smell her from across the field.
translation.es: Como si eso ayudara. Puedes olerla del otro lado del campo.

translation.en: I shouldn't have brought you here. I'm so sorry.
What? What are you-- Just be quiet and stand behind me.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Cállate y párate detrás de mí.

translation.en: I believe this belongs to you.
Thank you.
I am Laurent.
And this is Victoria...
and James.
I'm Carlisle. This is my family.
translation.es: Soy Carlisle. Esta es mi familia.

translation.en: Hello.
I'm afraid your hunting activities have caused something of a mess for us.
translation.es: Sus actividades nos han causado muchos problemas.

translation.en: Our apologies.
We didn't realize the territory had been claimed.
translation.es: No nos dimos cuenta de que el territorio estaba ocupado.

translation.en: Yes, well, we maintain a permanent residence nearby.
translation.es: Sí, mantenemos una residencia permanente cerca de aquí.

translation.en: Really?
Well, we won't be a problem anymore.
We were just passing through.
The humans were tracking us, but we led them east.
translation.es: Los humanos nos rastreaban, pero los guiamos hacia el este.

translation.en: [whispering] You should be safe.
Excellent.
So,
could you use three more players?
Oh, come on. Just one game.
Sure. Why not?
A few of us were leaving. You could take their place.
translation.es: Algunos se estaban yendo. Ustedes tomarán sus lugares.

translation.en: We'll bat first.
I'm the one with the wicked curveball.
Well, I think we can handle that. Oh! [laughs]
translation.es: Creo que somos capaces de lidiar con eso.

translation.en: We shall see.
You brought a snack.
[Laurent] A human?
[Carlisle] The girl is with us.
I think it best if you leave.
I can see the game is over.
translation.es: Veo que se acabó el juego.

translation.en: We'll go now.
[Carlisle] Get Bella out of here.
Go.
Okay, I've got it! I've got it! I'm all right!
-What, now he's coming after me? -[engine starts]
translation.es: ¿Qué, ahora va a venir por mí?

translation.en: Listen to me. James is a tracker.
translation.es: James es un rastreador. La caza es su obsesión.

translation.en: The hunt is his obsession. I read his mind.
translation.es: James es un rastreador. La caza es su obsesión. Leí su mente. Fue mi reacción en el campo.

translation.en: My reaction on the field set him off.
translation.es: Leí su mente. Fue mi reacción en el campo.

translation.en: I just made this his most exciting game ever.
translation.es: Acabo de convertir esto en la cacería más excitante de su vida.

translation.en: -He's never gonna stop. -What should we do?
We have to kill him. Rip him apart and burn the pieces.
translation.es: Tenemos que matarlo, hacerlo pedazos y quemar sus restos.

translation.en: -Where are we going? -Away from Forks.
We'll get a ferry to Vancouver. I have to go home. Now.
translation.es: - Vancouver. - Tengo que ir a casa. Ahora.

translation.en: -You have to take me home. -You can't go home.
translation.es: - Tienes que llevarme. - No puedes ir ahí.

translation.en: He's just gonna trace your scent there. It's the first place he's gonna look.
translation.es: Rastreará tu aroma. Ahí buscará primero.

translation.en: But my dad is there. We-- [yells] It doesn't matter!
Yes, it does! He could get killed because of us!
translation.es: ¡Claro que importa! ¡Podría morir por culpa nuestra!

translation.en: Just let me get you out of here first, all right?
translation.es: Solo déjame llevarte lejos de aquí.

translation.en: It's my dad! We have to go back!
We'll figure a way to lead the tracker away somehow.
I don't know. But we have to do something.
Edward, I said leave me alone.
translation.es: - Te dije que me dejes en paz. - Por favor, Bella.

translation.en: -Bella, don't do this, please. -It's over! Get out!
translation.es: - Te dije que me dejes en paz. - Por favor, Bella. ¡Se acabó!

translation.en: [Charlie] Hey, hey, hey, hey.
Bella? What's going on?
I just gotta get out of here. I'm leaving. Now.
translation.es: Tengo que irme de aquí. Ahora.

translation.en: [Charlie] Bella?
What am I gonna say to him?
I can't hurt him.
-Bella, what's going on? -You just have to.
I'll be down at the truck.
Did he hurt you?
Break up with you or something?
No, I broke up with him.
I thought you liked him.
Yeah, that's why I have to leave.
I don't want this. I have to go home.
translation.es: No quiero esto. Tengo que regresar a casa.

translation.en: Home? Your...
Your mom's not even in Phoenix.
translation.es: Tu mamá ni siquiera está en Phoenix.

translation.en: [Bella] She'll come home. I'll call her from the road.
You're not gonna drive home right now.
You can sleep on it. If you still feel like going in the morning,
translation.es: Duerme hasta mañana. Si aún quieres marcharte,

translation.en: I'll take you to the airport. No. I want to drive.
translation.es: - te llevaré al aeropuerto. - Quiero manejar.

translation.en: It'll give me more time to think.
I mean, if I get really tired, I'll pull into a motel. I promise.
translation.es: Si me canso, te prometo que buscaré un motel.

translation.en: Look, Bella, I know I'm not that much fun to be around,
translation.es: Bella, sé que no es divertido convivir conmigo,

translation.en: but I can change that. We can do more stuff together.
translation.es: pero puedo cambiar. Podemos hacer más cosas juntos.

translation.en: Like what?
Like watch baseball on the flat-screen?
Eat at the diner every night? Steak and cobbler?
translation.es: ¿Cenar carne con pastel todas las noches?

translation.en: Dad, that's you. That's not me.
translation.es: Así eres tú, papá. No yo.

translation.en: Bella, come on, I just...
[voice breaking] I just got you back.
Yeah, and, you know, if I don't get out now,
translation.es: Y si no me marcho ahora,

translation.en: then I'm just gonna be stuck here like Mom.
Your father's gonna forgive you.
Why don't you let me drive?
He won't.
You should've seen his face.
I told him the same thing that my mom told him when she was leaving him.
translation.es: Le dije lo mismo que le dijo mi mamá cuando lo dejó.

translation.en: It's the only way he'd let you go.
translation.es: Solo así permitiría que te fueras.

translation.en: Just don't worry about him now. He's safe. The tracker's following us.
translation.es: No te preocupes por él ahora. Está a salvo. El rastreador nos persigue.

translation.en: -Oh, God. -It's just Emmett.
Alice is in the car behind us.
translation.es: Alice nos sigue en el auto.

translation.en: [Carlisle] Wait.
He came to warn us about James.
This isn't my fight, and I've grown tired of his games,
translation.es: Esta no es mi batalla. Y estoy harto de sus juegos.

translation.en: but he's got unparalleled senses, absolutely lethal.
translation.es: Pero tiene unos sentidos inigualables. Es letal.

translation.en: I've never seen anything like him in my 300 years.
translation.es: No he visto nada parecido en mis 300 años.

translation.en: And the woman, Victoria, don't underestimate her.
translation.es: Y la mujer, Victoria, no la subestimen.

translation.en: I've had to fight our kind before. We're not easy to kill. [Emmett] But not impossible.
translation.es: - Nuestra especie es difícil de matar. - Pero no imposible.

translation.en: We'll tear them apart and burn the pieces.
translation.es: Lo mataremos y quemaremos sus restos.

translation.en: I don't relish the thought of killing another creature,
translation.es: No me entusiasma la perspectiva de matar,

translation.en: even a sadistic one like James.
translation.es: ni siquiera a un sádico como James.

translation.en: What if he kills one of us first? I'm gonna run Bella south.
translation.es: - ¿Y si mata a uno de nosotros? - Nos iremos al sur.

translation.en: Can you lead the tracker away from here?
No, Edward. James knows you would never leave Bella.
translation.es: No. James sabe que jamás la abandonarías.

translation.en: -He'll follow you. -[Alice] I'll go with Bella.
translation.es: - Te seguirá. - Yo iré con Bella.

translation.en: Jasper and I will drive her south.
I'll keep her safe, Edward.
Can you keep your thoughts to yourself? Yes.
could you put these on so the tracker will pick up Bella's scent?
translation.es: ¿pueden ponerse estos así el rastreador sigue el aroma de Bella?

translation.en: Why? What is she to me?
Rosalie, Bella is with Edward.
She's part of this family now.
And we protect our family.
translation.es: Y nosotros protegemos a nuestra familia.

translation.en: Oh, God. If anything...
If anything happens, I swear to God...
translation.es: Si algo llegara a pasar, juro que…

translation.en: Nothing's gonna happen.
There's seven of us, and there's two of them,
translation.es: Nosotros somos siete, ellos apenas dos.

translation.en: and when everything's done, I'm gonna come back and get you.
translation.es: Cuando todo esto haya terminado, regresaré por ti.

translation.en: Yeah.
Bella, you are my life now.
Hey, Mom. It's me again.
You must have let your phone die or something.
I'm not in Forks, but everything's okay, and I'll explain it later.
translation.es: No estoy en Forks, pero estoy bien. Luego te explico todo.

translation.en: [Edward] Rosalie, mark the tree.
That's good.
What is it? What do you see?
He's figured it out.
The tracker, he just changed course.
translation.es: El rastreador. Acaba de cambiar de rumbo.

translation.en: -Where will it take him, Alice? -Mirrors.
A room full of mirrors.
Edward said the visions weren't always certain.
translation.es: Sus visiones no siempre son exactas.

translation.en: [Jasper] She sees the course people are on while they're on it.
translation.es: Ve el destino de la gente mientras sigan un rumbo.

translation.en: If they change their minds, the vision changes.
translation.es: Si cambian de opinión, la visión cambia.

translation.en: Okay, so the course that the tracker's on now
is gonna lead him to a ballet studio?
translation.es: va rumbo a un estudio de ballet?

translation.en: -You've been here? -I took lessons as a kid.
translation.es: - ¿Has estado ahí? - De pequeña tomé clases.

translation.en: The school I went to had an arch just like that.
translation.es: Mi escuela tenía un arco como ese.

translation.en: Was your school here in Phoenix?
-Yeah. -[cell phone vibrating]
-Edward, are you okay? -We've lost the tracker.
The woman's still in the area.
translation.es: La mujer sigue en el área.

translation.en: Rosalie and Esme are going back to Forks to protect your father.
translation.es: Rosalie y Esme regresaron a Forks para proteger a tu padre.

translation.en: I'm coming to get you. Then you and I are gonna go somewhere alone.
translation.es: Estoy regresando por ti, y tú y yo vamos a irnos solos.

translation.en: And the others will keep hunting.
I'll do whatever it takes to make you safe again.
translation.es: Haré lo que sea con tal de que estés a salvo.

translation.en: Hey, Mom, I'm glad you got my message.
translation.es: Hola, mamá. Qué suerte que recibiste mi mensaje.

translation.en: What are you doing home?
[Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
-Calm down, everything's fine. -Bella? Bella?
-I'll explain everything later... -[rustling]
Mom, are you there?
[James] Forks High School doesn't protect its students' privacy very well.
translation.es: Tu escuela no protege la privacidad de sus estudiantes.

translation.en: It was just too easy for Victoria to find your previous address.
translation.es: A Victoria le fue demasiado fácil encontrar tu dirección.

translation.en: It's a nice house you have here.
I was prepared to wait for you,
but then Mom came home after she received a very worried call from your dad,
translation.es: pero tu mamá regresó luego de recibir una llamada de tu papá.

translation.en: and it all worked out quite well.
-Mm. -[Renee] Wait, wait...
Don't touch her! Don't...
-You can still save her. -[Bella] Don't!
But you're gonna have to get away from your friends.
translation.es: Pero tendrás que alejarte de tus amigos.

translation.en: Can you handle that? Where should I meet you?
How about your old ballet studio?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal tu antiguo estudio de ballet?

translation.en: And I'll know if you bring anyone along.
translation.es: Y sabré si trajiste a alguien contigo.

translation.en: Poor Mommy would pay the price for that mistake.
translation.es: Tu pobre mamá pagaría por ese error.

translation.en: [Bella] I'd never given much thought to how I would die.
translation.es: Nunca había pensado en cómo iba a morir.

translation.en: But dying in the place of someone I love seems like a good way to go.
translation.es: Pero morir en lugar de alguien a quien amo me parece una buena manera.

translation.en: I can't bring myself to regret the decisions that brought me face-to-face with death.
translation.es: No puedo arrepentirme de las decisiones que me trajeron a esto.

translation.en: They also brought me to Edward.
translation.es: También hicieron que conociera a Edward.

translation.en: [Renee] Bella? Bella? Bella, where are you?
-Mom? -Bella?
-Mom? -There you are.
What are you doing in here?
[young Bella] Everyone makes fun of me.
[Renee] Come on, you're a wonderful dancer.
Mom, I suck.
[Renee] You do not suck.
That's my favorite part.
You were a stubborn child, weren't you?
-She's not even here. -No.
[James] Sorry.
You know, but you really made it too easy.
translation.es: Pero todo esto resultó tan fácil.

translation.en: So, to make things more entertaining,
translation.es: Así que, para hacer las cosas más interesantes,

translation.en: I'm gonna make a little film of our time together.
translation.es: voy a filmar un video de nuestro encuentro.

translation.en: I borrowed this from your house. I hope you don't mind.
translation.es: Encontré esto en tu casa. Espero que no te moleste.

translation.en: action.
Oh. That'll break Edward's little heart.
translation.es: Eso le partirá el corazón al pobre Edward.

translation.en: You have... Edward has nothing to do with this!
translation.es: ¡Edward no tiene nada que ver con esto!

translation.en: But he does.
Oh, his rage will make for more interesting sport
translation.es: Su furia hará de esto algo mucho más interesante

translation.en: than his feeble attempt to protect you.
translation.es: que su débil intento por protegerte.

translation.en: And let's continue.
Beautiful. Very visually dynamic.
I chose my stage well.
It's too bad he didn't have the strength to turn you.
translation.es: Qué pena que no tuvo el valor para convertirte.

translation.en: Instead, he kept you this fragile little human.
translation.es: En cambio, sigues siendo una humana pequeña y frágil.

translation.en: It's cruel, really.
Tell Edward how much it hurts.
Tell him to avenge you. Tell him!
No, Edward, don't! Tell him! Tell him!
You're alone 'cause you're faster than the others.
translation.es: Viniste solo porque eres más veloz que los otros.

translation.en: But not stronger.
I'm strong enough to kill you.
I'm sorry.
-Bella, Bella, it's okay. -Son.
Enough.
Remember who you are.
[Carlisle] Bella needs you.
It's okay.
Oh, God.
Carlisle? Her blood.
-[Carlisle] Your brothers will take care of him. -I got him.
translation.es: Tus hermanos se encargarán de él.

translation.en: -[Alice] Carlisle! -Start the fire.
[Emmett] Get the floorboards.
[Jasper] Alice! Alice, go.
Her femoral artery's been severed. She's losing too much blood.
translation.es: Le cortó la arteria femoral. Está perdiendo sangre.

translation.en: No, no, my head is burning!
It's the venom.
You have to make a choice. You could let the change happen.
translation.es: Tienes que tomar una decisión. ¿Vas a dejar que se convierta?

translation.en: No. No.
It's gonna happen, Edward. I've seen it. It doesn't have to be that way.
translation.es: - Va a ocurrir. Lo he visto. - No tiene por qué ser así.

translation.en: She's still hemorrhaging. Alice, make me a tourniquet. Your belt.
Carlisle, what's my other option?
Tie it above my hands.
Carlisle!
Go.
We could try to suck the venom out. You know I won't be able to stop.
translation.es: - Extrae el veneno. - No podré detenerme.

translation.en: Then find the will to stop.
But choose.
She only has minutes left.
I'm gonna make it go away, Bella.
I'm gonna make it go away.
Edward, stop. Her blood is clean. You're killing her.
translation.es: Detente. Su sangre está limpia. La estás matando.

translation.en: Stop.
[softly] Stop.
Find the will.
[Bella] Death is peaceful, easy.
translation.es: La muerte es paz. Es fácil.

translation.en: Life is harder.
Bella?
Baby?
[whispering] Bella.
-Mom? -Hey.
Where is he?
Where's Edward?
He's asleep.
He never leaves.
And your dad, he's down at the cafeteria.
translation.es: Tu papá está en la cafetería.

translation.en: What happened?
Well, when you fell, you broke your leg,
translation.es: Al caerte, te rompiste la pierna.

translation.en: and you lost a lot of blood.
You don't remember any of this, do you?
Edward came down with his dad
to try to convince you to come back to Forks.
translation.es: Trataron de convencerte de que regresaras a Forks.

translation.en: So you went over to their hotel, then you tripped,
translation.es: Fuiste a su hotel, te tropezaste

translation.en: and you fell down two flights of stairs.
Went through a window!
Yeah, that sounds like me.
translation.es: Suena a algo que yo haría.

translation.en: Oh, honey, I'm so sorry.
It's Phil.
He's so worried about you.
You're texting.
[chuckles] Finally, yeah.
I told him to stay down in Florida.
translation.es: Le dije que se quedara allá.

translation.en: Honey, you are gonna love Jacksonville. It's sunny every day,
translation.es: Te va a encantar Jacksonville. Hay sol todos los días.

translation.en: and we found the cutest little house, and you've got your own bathroom--
translation.es: Encontramos una casa hermosa, y tendrás baño propio.

translation.en: Mom, I still want to live in Forks.
What?
I want to live in Forks.
Well, okay, we'll talk about it.
translation.es: Bueno, pero luego hablaremos de eso.

translation.en: Do you mind getting Dad?
I have to talk to him. Apologize.
translation.es: Necesito hablar con él. Pedirle disculpas.

translation.en: Okay, baby. I'll go get him.
translation.es: Sí, mi amor. Iré por él.

translation.en: And I'll go get a nurse, okay? Okay.
translation.es: - Y también por la enfermera. - Bueno.

translation.en: So what happened?
Where's James?
We took care of it.
And the woman, Victoria, she ran off.
I'm alive because of you.
No, you're in here because of me.
translation.es: No, estás aquí por mi culpa.

translation.en: The worst part of it was that...
I thought I wasn't gonna be able to stop.
translation.es: que pensé que no iba a poder detenerme.

translation.en: You did stop.
Bella, you gotta go to Jacksonville so I can't hurt you anymore.
translation.es: Tienes que ir a Jacksonville para que no pueda lastimarte.

translation.en: What?
Are you... No!
[stuttering] I don't even know what you're... How...
What are you talking about? You want me to go away? I can't...
No, I can't... I can't just leave you...
I know.
We can't be apart.
You can't leave me.
I'm here.
Okay, just don't...
You just can't say stuff like that to me. Ever.
translation.es: No puedes volver a decirme eso. Jamás.

translation.en: Where else am I gonna go?
Alice lent me the dress.
The cast is...
You're perfect.
I'll take care of her, Chief Swan.
Uh-huh. I've heard that before.
Uh, Bells...
I put a new can of pepper spray in your bag.
translation.es: Puse otro gas paralizante en tu bolso.

translation.en: Dad.
And...
Well, you look beautiful.
Thanks.
See you.
Hey. I'll be right back.
-Bella. -[Bella] Jacob.
Hey.
Nice. You, too.
Are you crashing the prom or something? Did you come with a date?
translation.es: ¿Te invitaron al baile? ¿Vienes con una muchacha?

translation.en: My dad paid me to come talk to you.
translation.es: Mi papá me pagó para que viniera a hablarte.

translation.en: Twenty bucks.
Let's hear it.
Just don't get mad, okay?
He wants you to break up with your boyfriend.
translation.es: Quiere que rompas con tu novio.

translation.en: It's just, he said, quote,
"We'll be watching you."
-[laughs] -Okay, well, tell him, "Thanks." Okay.
translation.es: - Dile que se lo agradezco. - Bueno.

translation.en: -And to pay up. -Okay. Let me help you.
[Edward] Jacob.
I'll take it from here.
Guess I'll see you around, Bella.
I leave you alone for two minutes, and the wolves descend.
translation.es: Te dejo sola por dos minutos, y los lobos descienden.

translation.en: I can't believe you're making me do this. Just smile.
Wow. You are really trying to kill me.
translation.es: En serio quieres que me mate.

translation.en: The prom is an important rite of passage. I didn't want you to miss anything.
translation.es: Este baile es un rito importante. No quería que te lo perdieras.

translation.en: Bella, hey!
-Do you want to go? -Yeah.
[Eric] All right, slowing it down.
Shall we?
You're serious?
Oh, why not? ♪ Wide on my plastic toys ♪
See, you're dancing.
At prom.
Edward, why did you save me?
If you just let the venom spread,
I could be like you by now.
You don't know what you're saying.
-You don't want this. -I want you.
translation.es: - No quieres esto. - Te quiero a ti.

translation.en: Always.
I'm not gonna end your life for you.
I'm dying already.
Every second, I get closer.
Older.
That's the way it's supposed to be.
Alice said that she saw me like you.
translation.es: Alice dijo que me vio como tú.

translation.en: -I heard her. -Her visions change.
Yeah, based on what people decide.
translation.es: Basado en lo que la gente decide.

translation.en: I've decided.
So that's what you dream about.
Becoming a monster.
I dream about being with you forever.
translation.es: Sueño con estar contigo para siempre.

translation.en: Forever?
And you're ready right now?
Yes.
Is it not enough just to have a long and happy life with me?
translation.es: ¿No es suficiente pasar toda una vida conmigo?

translation.en: Yeah.
For now.
[Bella] No one will surrender tonight,
but I won't give in.
translation.es: pero no me daré por vencida.

translation.en: I know what I want.
